1.content:
You awaken with the odd feeling that your body is no longer your own, and you awaken with this strange tingling in your chest. You get up to notice that your body has been modified a little, that your breasts are now 38DD size and they hurt your back. You stand up, but fall over due to the shift in gravity.

Your body then is picked up and is lifted in the air. You look at Jake and see him staring back at you.

"I see you've awoken. You've refused me for the last time. I hope you like my little gift. These are now yours, and I can control them!"

You feel yourself let go of. "You have no control over my body. I'm not a whore."

You feel your breasts literally pull you towards him, and they rub against him. "I'm going to make you want me. You're my slave now, and you'll do as I say. I can control you now."

You feel a hand reach in his pants and massage him gently. What does he do next?
1.title: Personal Agenda

info.brief_description: A girl named Alex is cursed to have her body perform acts without her wanting it to happen
info.description: Your name is Alex, and you're a 15-year-old girl who rejects a guy who wants you to have sex with him. One day, however, you wake up to him saying he'll get you one way or another. You awake one morning and feel something going on with your body.
